text: Congrats
<@U02DGQYK1> Is it doable to upgrade from v3.2.0-tip-3-00bcb20b04826393bd426478ee260c553225e463 to v3.2.1 ??
Yes

attachments.text: <https://zoom.us/j/3403934274> Welcome to the fourth (v004) Digital Rebar online meetup!  In today's meetup we'll discuss the status of Digital Rebar Provisi

text: <@U6QFVRJNB> can I curl/wget the v3.2.1 dr-provision binary from somewhere?

not just the binary - but you can get the zip file and just extract the binary - if you check the installer script (<https://get.rebar.digital/stable>), you'll see:
```echo "Installing Version $DRP_VERSION of Digital Rebar Provision
curl -sfL -o dr-provision.zip <https://github.com/digitalrebar/provision/releases/download/$DRP_VERSION/dr-provision.zip>
curl -sfL -o dr-provision.sha256 <https://github.com/digitalrebar/provision/releases/download/$DRP_VERSION/dr-provision.sha256>```
so substitute the DRP_VERSION (eg "stable") for the variable - and you can wget / curl it directly
OK, done, thx
Is there any reason that in UX’s “Machines”, when you edit a node, you cannot change the “Name” of the node?
I can see making the UUID immutable, but not the Name…
Name should be Changable.  Fqdn is required
FQDN? I’ve always just used a shortname for “Name”
I think in the UI it's not changeable
yeah, I can't edit it from the UI
or at least, it's not obvious how
I don’t know why, I can change it thru drpcli
I would expect that to be a UI bug
that is a UX feature which hasn't been implemented yet ... please feel free to submit an enhancement request ...
OK, done - #537
thx!
